data.name: Voidborn
data.detailed_description:
Voidborn is a fast-paced roguelite FPS that combines fine tuned movement- and combat inspired by Ultrakill and Doom Eternal with level- and character progression inspired by Hades.

EXPLORE A DARK FANTASY WORLD

Set in a in a dark fantasy world inspired by Dark Souls, you play as a Voidborn. A powerful creature created by the gods destined to reclaim The Kingdom of Twilight and bring radiance back to the lands. Explore a dark decaying world with various unique and ever-changing environments each filled with distinct enemies, bosses, and platforming elements.

WIELD POWERFUL WEAPONS

Customize your weapons with a wide variety of upgrades. Shoot lightning beams that scatter between enemies, icicles that stun, bullets that ricochet, or upgrade your weapons with different explosives. Use your gravity powers to deflect incoming projectiles, boost yourself high in the air or push enemies off ledges. The possibilities of combat are endless.

MOVE SWIFTLY

Jump, dash, slide, wall-jump, wall-ride, ground-slam, bounce on enemies, there is a fitting movement option for every situation you find yourself in.

BECOME UNSTOPPABLE

This world does not accept weakness. Unlock new weapons and abilities and permanently upgrade them aswell as your character traits to survive longer on your next run.

data.short_description: Voidborn is a fast-paced roguelite FPS that combines skill-based action and swift movement with roguelike level progression and character customization. Rip apart demons with devastating weapon builds and reach as far as possible before you inevitably perish and become reborn stronger than ever.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8250U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce MX150
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
